name: Custom Login Page Logo
author: Horendra Pal Singh Kandari

sections.description:
Custom Login Page Logo is a very light weight, handy, easy to use, simple layout plugin that lets you change the default wordpress logo that you see on login page.

When you create your website, the wordpress uses it’s own logo for login page ( wp-admin ) page which looks very unprofessional.

But when you use this plugin to change the wordpress logo and add your own logo of the company/agency then it looks more professional and match with your brand.

You can always change it whenever you want.

Features

1). Very light weight, handy, easy to use, simple layout.
2). Secure, translation ready ( Hindi only ).
3). Can add logo height and width with unit.
4). Doesn’t impact on your website speed.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

  1. Just install the plugin
  2. After installing the plugin you will get a admin menu “Login Logo”, click there
  3. Click on upload logo and a media uploader popup will appear
  4. Select your logo
  5. Save changes

That’s it, next time when you login with wp-admin you will get a new logo

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.
sections.changelog:

  • Add height and width including unit for Logo
  • Improve coding and functionality
  • Update Translation ready file

1.2

  • Translation ready

1.1

  • Compatible to wordpress 6.6.1.
  • Description updated

1.0

  • Plugin released.

screenshots.caption: Initially screen of the plugin page when there is no logo is uploaded (screenshot-1.png)
Upload a logo with media uploader (screenshot-2.png)
Image URL is displayed inside the input field (screenshot-3.png)
Once saved, the logo will be displayed on the plugin page (screenshot-4.png)
Once saved, the logo will be displayed on the wp-admin page too (screenshot-5.png)
